name: Store Oasis
description:
Ludum Dare 49 -  Unstable

It won’t get more unstable that this. Trust us.

Backstory

Late January, 2038. The world is unstable after Y2k38. You are in need of products but you are poor. Steal your 6 items without being seen. Then exit the store.

Controls
  • QE to balance the stolen items on your unstable person.
  • WASD + Space + Mouse.
  • C to crouch.
  • Click on an item to shoplift it.

Press Space to begin.

Project info

Made in Unity. All assets made by team during jam.
